LanguageData.VWE_HuntingStealth.label: hunting stealth
LanguageData.VWE_HuntingStealth.description: The weapon held by this person provides increased hunting stealth.
LanguageData.VWE_ExtraPain.label: increased pain sensitivity
LanguageData.VWE_ExtraPain.description: This creature has increased pain sensitivity due to being struck by a barbed arrow.
LanguageData.VWE_ReducedMoveSpeed.label: encumbered
LanguageData.VWE_ReducedMoveSpeed.description: The weapon held by this person is very heavy, reducing move speed.
LanguageData.VWE_SkeletonizedFrame.label: skeletonized frame
LanguageData.VWE_SkeletonizedFrame.description: The weapon held by this person is very light, increasing move speed.
LanguageData.VWE_IlluminatedSights.label: illuminated sights
LanguageData.VWE_IlluminatedSights.description: The weapon held by this person is fitted with self-illuminating sights.
LanguageData.VWE_ComfortGrip.label: comfort grip
LanguageData.VWE_ComfortGrip.description: The weapon held by this person is fitted with a custom-molded, ergonomic handle wrapped in high-quality leather.
LanguageData.VWE_GrimNotches.label: grim notches
LanguageData.VWE_GrimNotches.description: The weapon held by this person is covered in crude, carved notches, each tallying a life taken by a previous owner.
LanguageData.VWE_VoidInscriptions.label: void inscriptions
LanguageData.VWE_VoidInscriptions.description: The weapon held by this person is etched with shifting, non-euclidean glyphs that whisper to the wielder, continually draining their mental stability while equipped.
